mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (comm_no, board_no, mem_no, comm_content, comm_date) VALUES (comments_seq.nextval, #{boardNo}, #{memNo}, #{commContent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT c.comm_no AS commNo, c.board_no AS boardNo, c.mem_no AS memNo, m.mem_id AS memId, m.mem_name AS memName, c.comm_content AS commContent, c.comm_date AS commDate, c.comm_update AS commUpdate FROM comments c LEFT JOIN member m ON c.mem_no = m.mem_no WHERE c.board_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY c.comm_no ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE comments SET comm_content = #{commContent}, comm_update = SYSDATE WHERE comm_no = #{commNo}
mapper.select: SELECT c.comm_no AS commNo, c.board_no AS boardNo, c.mem_no AS memNo, m.mem_id AS memId, m.mem_name AS memName, c.comm_content AS commContent, c.comm_date AS commDate, c.comm_update AS commUpdate FROM comments c LEFT JOIN member m ON c.mem_no = m.mem_no WHERE c.comm_no = #{commNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_q.*, ROWNUM AS rn FROM ( SELECT c.comm_no AS commNo, c.board_no AS boardNo, c.mem_no AS memNo, m.mem_id AS memId, m.mem_name AS memName, c.comm_content AS commContent, c.comm_date AS commDate, c.comm_update AS commUpdate, b.board_subject AS boardSubject FROM comments c LEFT JOIN member m ON c.mem_no = m.mem_no LEFT JOIN board b ON c.board_no = b.board_no WHERE c.mem_no = #{memNo} ORDER BY c.comm_no DESC ) inner_q WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) WHERE rn >= #{startRow}
